attributes.action: Close Early years settings in England to non key worker children
attributes.additional_details: Early years staff and children are not immune to COVID 19 and other Variants of the virus. Staff who work in Early years do not have the appropriate PPE protection to protect them from the virus. Early years staff are also not required to wear PPE for the safety of themselves and others.
attributes.background: The Government must close Nurseries and Childminder settings to non  key worker children in England during a nationwide lockdown.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566718
